verbs.description: A mystery [V: is] brewing at the White House about what happened to the oak tree Trump and Macron planted there last week .
[ARG1: A mystery] is [V: brewing] [ARGM-LOC: at the White House] [C-ARG1: about what happened to the oak tree Trump and Macron planted there last week] .
A mystery is brewing at the White House about [ARG1: what] [V: happened] [ARG2: to the oak tree Trump and Macron planted there last week] .
A mystery is brewing at the White House about what happened to [ARG1: the oak tree] [ARG0: Trump and Macron] [V: planted] [ARGM-LOC: there] [ARGM-TMP: last week] .
